string.text: I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, and I am honored to serve you.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the house of {CLAN_NAME}.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the Arabs for generations.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has stood in the Tribal Council and discharged its duties honorably since the first days of the Arab Kingdoms.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Though one should not be too proud of one's lineage, I am glad to say that we have always taken seriously our duty to protect the common folk of the Arabs.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Arabs.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Arabs. The barbarians we have slain, and the glory we have won, is second to none.
rightful Sultan of the Arabs
rightful Sultana of the Arabs

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We received our title from the Emperor himself. Not that he had much choice about it, as he was held captive in one of our raiding ships at the time, but I'm sure he recognized the nobility of our blood.
rightful King of the French
rightful Queen of the French

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Welsh. The barbarians we have slain, and the glory we have won, is second to none.
rightful King of the Welsh
rightful Queen of the Welsh
